column4: Southwest  Microsoft  Apple could benefit from tax plan - Barron's
column5: NEW YORK  Dec 3 Tax cuts that passed the Senate early on Saturday could bolster the shares of Southwest Airlines   Apple  Microsoft and Alphabet   according to a report in financial publication Barron's.

column4: Apple's Tim Cook says developers have earned $17 billion from China App Store
column5: WUZHEN  China Apple Inc's chief executive Tim Cook said developers using its platform in China number 1.8 million and have earned a total 112 billion yuan ($16.93 billion)  representing roughly a quarter of total global App Store earnings.

column4: Tesla switches on giant battery to shore up Australia's grid
column5: (This Dec 1 story corrects paragraph 6 to clarify name and description of company) | Video

column4: CORRECTED-Tesla switches on giant battery to shore up Australia's grid
column5: HORNSDALE  Australia  Dec 1 Tesla Inc switched on the world's biggest lithium ion battery on Friday in time to feed Australia's shaky power grid for the first day of summer  meeting a promise by Elon Musk to build it in 100 days or give it free.

column4: BRIEF-CVS Health to acquire Aetna in $69 bln deal
column5: * CVS HEALTH TO ACQUIRE AETNA; COMBINATION TO PROVIDE CONSUMERS WITH A BETTER EXPERIENCE  REDUCED COSTS AND IMPROVED ACCESS TO HEALTH CARE EXPERTS IN HOMES AND COMMUNITIES ACROSS THE COUNTRY

column4: CVS Health to acquire Aetna for $69 billion in year's largest acquisition
column5: U.S. drugstore chain operator CVS Health Corp  said on Sunday it had agreed to acquire U.S. health insurer Aetna Inc  for $69 billion  seeking to tackle soaring healthcare spending through lower-cost medical services in pharmacies. | Video

column4: CVS-Aetna deal to change how big employers buy health benefits
column5: NEW YORK CVS Health Corp's  proposed purchase of Aetna Inc  will change the way many major U.S. corporations buy health coverage for employees and raise new questions over the cost of those benefits  benefit consultants said.

column4: UPDATE 2-CVS Health to acquire Aetna for $69 bln in year's largest acquisition
column5: Dec 3 U.S. drugstore chain operator CVS Health Corp said on Sunday it had agreed to acquire U.S. health insurer Aetna Inc for $69 billion  seeking to tackle soaring healthcare spending through lower-cost medical services in pharmacies.

column4: Aetna's board set to approve $68 bln sale to CVS Health -sources
column5: Dec 3 Aetna Inc's board of directors was meeting on Sunday to approve the U.S. health insurer's sale to U.S. drugstore chain operator CVS Health Corp for approximately $207 per share in cash and stock  according to people familiar with the matter.

column4: UPDATE 2-CVS Health to acquire Aetna for $69 bln in year's largest acquisition

column4: RPT-UPDATE 2-India's Infosys taps Capgemini exec Parekh as CEO
column5: MUMBAI  Dec 2 Infosys  India's No.2 IT services company  named Salil S Parekh as chief executive on Saturday  picking an outsider for the job for a second time and handing him the twin challenges of reviving growth and forging peace between its founders and board following a public spat.

column4: TIM's board to discuss network options this week: source
column5: MILAN The board of Telecom Italia (TIM) will this week discuss options for its fixed-line network  including possibly splitting it off  although no decision is expected to be made  a source close to the company said on Sunday.
